messages.title: Labour has failed us...
messages.content: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise.

messages.title: ...but is this the kind of change we want?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Concerns about NHS spending and privatization.
20% VAT 'could be introduced within weeks of a Tory victory at the next election.'

issues.governance: Claims of cabinet cowardice and leadership contest avoidance
issues.health: Worries over the state of the NHS and potential privatization.

quotes.text: unemployment is already at crisis level
[Brown] limps on only because of cabinet cowardice and the fear among backbenchers that a leadership contest now would split the party.
We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is it [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller.
quotes.source: Top Conservative MEP Dan Hannan on the NHS August 2009

quotes.text: Tory adviser Julia Manning wants end to minor treatments on NHS
20% VAT 'could be introduced within weeks of a Tory victory at the next election'
David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners

images.caption: Images of Gordon Brown looking distressed and David Cameron smiling, accompanied by critical quotes and headlines.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet critiquing the Labour Party's handling of the NHS and implying negative consequences should the Conservative Party come to power.
